items.sentence: I hope I have enough money to buy everything we need.
I hope Tom serves time for the crimes he's committed.
This picture reminds me of the time I spent with Tom.
I don't want to spend the rest of my life doing this.
Are you sure that it was yesterday that Tom did that?
Tom would never do what you're accusing him of doing.
Tom left Mary and the children and went to Australia.
Tom drank the glass of water that Mary handed to him.
Tom and Mary were drinking in front of the fireplace.
What I want is for you to help us get Tom to do that.
To tell the truth, this winter hasn't been very cold.
When elephants fight, the grass always gets trampled.
How long does it usually take people to learn French?
Tom told me that he wanted to get his tattoo removed.
I hope that we can clear this up quickly and quietly.
It's a good thing you were able to do that yesterday.
All I really wanted to do was to spend time with Tom.
Tom promised you that he wouldn't do that, didn't he?
Was Tom the one who told you that you should do that?
Was Tom the one who told you that you had to do that?
Do you still do that with Tom as much as you used to?
I'm looking forward to hearing what Tom's opinion is.
My father was about to leave when the telephone rang.
The office where my father works is near the station.
There is no such a thing as a comprehensive textbook.
Will you stop answering my questions with a question?
I've already sent an email to the support department.
We could hear the bells ringing from a nearby church.
I've been wearing this denim jacket for 15 years now.
If you pass this test, you could graduate next month.
If possible, I'd like to know the name of the author.
The king has reigned over the country for many years.
There's no use crying for help. No one will hear you.
The problem is that solar energy just costs too much.
Because it started to rain, I couldn't use my camera.
I stopped talking to Tom when I saw Mary approaching.
My life wouldn't been easier if I'd stayed in Boston.
You're the only one who needs to do that, aren't you?
You're the only one who wants to do that, aren't you?
You and I've been through a lot together, haven't we?
You'll probably be able to do that when you're older.
Tom is going to break everything if he's not careful.
I think you should know that I have to do that today.
I think you should know that I won't do that for you.
I think you should know I can't go with you tomorrow.
I know the last thing that you want to do is help me.
Didn't you know Tom doesn't understand French at all?
I can walk back, so you don't need to give me a ride.
I won't force you to do that, but I think you should.
My first three weeks here were very difficult for me.
